official_title: A bill to designate the United States Post Office Building in Rossville, Georgia, as the "Lawrence P. McDonald Post Office Building".

summary.text: Designates the U.S. Post Office Building in Rossville, Georgia, as the Lawrence P. McDonald Post Office Building.
